page.title: 18Children's Clubs.
page.content: Ash is lucky in the variety of activities available to children, locally and within easy reach of the area. The Scout Movement is represented at all age levels by Beavers, Cubs, Brownies, Guides, Scouts and Venture Scouts. Dancing lessons include not only Ballet and tap ,but also country dancing, disco and ballroom dancing. Many children are interested in sport and learn swimming, trampolin- ing, riding, football and karate. Sunday schools are attached to all our local churches and St. Mary's Church has a youth club. There is also a club for 5-ll year olds called the Cockleshell Club which uses the Methodist Church.
